title: If Akali gains the ability of being invisible with no way to reveal her, I will leave the game
body:
If Riot keeps her able to avoid all types of vision, then I will just uninstall and get my account deleted. 

It will be the final proof that Riot doesn't respect their own game's rules anymore, downright laughing at the idea of balance and limits.
From champions being able to block projectiles, stealing summoner spells to now making true sight not actually true sight, if Akali is kept like that it will open the door for future champions and reworks that further don't play by the rules like a reworked Rammus with a W that reduces all damage, including true damage.

If she's launched in that state I will give you 1 month for you Live team to remove that interaction.
If after one month, she keeps that slap to game's rules, I will write an email to Support asking for the deletion of my account and if they refuse I will just blindly change my password to something unintelligible and act as the game disappeared. 
God knows I've been needing to just drop this game, this last piss on the game's rules is the last straw.

This is not an ultimatum, I'm not demanding that Riot acts this way, this is my manifesto of how far the game has gone, to the point where you just let champion designers ignore fundamental mechanics for the sake of change and how I've had enough of Riot's lack of integrity.

Enough unfair mechanics that spit on the game's rules.
